attributes.review:
i'm not gonna get tik tok taken down without a fight. gen z dosent go down. if the us can put this much time and energy into deleting an APP FOR KIDS then they can put the same amount of energy into ending world hunger, finding jobs for people, putting effort into things that are more important. i hate bunker boy with a passion and he deserves nothing 😌 

thank u for ur time
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: downloaded this app yesterday and it flooded my phone with so many bugs and alerts that it caused my phone to overheat, leading to a fire. my once small, comfortable home is now in ashes and i personally want to blame Mr. Trump and his staff for releasing such a catastrophic app. if i could rate this app lower i would. i’m currently on an old iphone 5s now because of it.
attributes.title: this app caused my house to burn down

attributes.review: This app is the worst thing I’ve seen so far ✨🧚🏽💕I know all the Karen’s and johns are going to come for me but I don’t care they can deal with it Obama 2020 just to make them make even more and if I could give this 0 stars I still don’t understand how people still support Trump they much have a mental illness but anyways Obama 2020 😚😚
attributes.title: This app makes me want to kill myself

attributes.review: I have no words for how disgusting this nasty person is. A sexist, racist, fascist burnt Cheeto. I wish that I could describe how nasty this imposter of a man is but, I don’t know enough curse words to do so. I’ll leave you with this...for a man that hides away in a bunker it’s clear to see that short man syndrome really gets the best of him. Wish home nothing but the absolute worst 🧚🏻‍♂️🥰
attributes.title: A disgrace that makes me embarrassed to be human

attributes.review: It was terrifying, when I got the app, EVERYTHING would turn orange every so often🎃. Then my parrot started saying “ew, trump”. 🦜I was so disappointed 😔. But it gets worse. I was cooking, and... my phone started BLASTING “🎼sweet home Alabama🎼”, I was in a meeting! And taking a dump. Then my sisters Boss’s daughter’s sons dogs trainer came over opened the app and my phone broke😵 now I can’t find it! All because THIS APP😡😡😡👁👄👁
attributes.title: HELP (DONT GET)

attributes.review: The whole app is just articles and articles TRASHING on Joe Biden. Now I’m not a fan of sleepy Joe but I want to learn about MY President!!!! I want to learn the facts and the evidence about President Trump and more about his campaigns and projects. All I’m seeing is “Joe Biden did this” and “Joe Biden did that” please provide more information about Trump not just a few articles every 10 posts!!
attributes.title: Not enough information!!

attributes.review: i downloaded it and right away my phone began to glitch to barron trump as we all know he needs saving so i took this as an SOS. when i clicked on the app the first thing i saw was trumps face. absolutely disgusting, ruined my whole day. anyways hope the authorities help me save barron so all the single ladies can finally satisfy their simping needs - thankyou
attributes.title: ✨horrible working app✨

attributes.review: I was really looking forward to using this app since trump is such a great businessman🥰✨🏢but I have news for ya, he has no idea how to build a usable app. Daily updates on his facial routine, which btw don’t do him any justice🍊🤮, virtual tours of his golden toilet, and pictures of his daughter in lingerie are NOT what I signed up for. Therefor I will not be voting for trump in the next election💗🧚‍♀️.
attributes.title: hiGhLy disappointed😡✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: This was a way for me too see why people vote for trump but in reality it just made me mad that in 3 years he has caused more debt lost of jobs and many more horrible things then Obama ever did in 8 years so this is a message for every to rethink when voting for trump cus do u want a Cheeto man that instead of making America great again makes it terrible to be ur president
attributes.title: Bad app
